description: Incidents during the virus outbreak rise significantly, with demand for support services doubling.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man's domestic abuse rate rises 21% during pandemic
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man's domestic abuse rate rises 21% during pandemic - BBC News
maintext: "Unfortunately that would mean that in a domestic abuse situation, if one person is more controlling and has more power over another, they would use and exert that power even more so," she added.
